regen.absent_element: confirmation of manually entered or overwritten data by the driver
regen.new_specification: The system shall require confirmation from the driver for manually entered or overwritten train data before allowing train movement.

regen.absent_element: automatic entry of train data when stationary
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow automatic entry of train data when the train is stationary.

regen.absent_element: warning for incorrect or incomplete train data entry
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the driver if the entered train data is incorrect or incomplete.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
